The changes you made are fine.

blocks.subject: AW Tech - NDA
text: Attached is a version of the NDA proposed by AW Technologies which has been
Please review and let me know if you should need to discuss anything noted.
If not, please feel free to forward this as you deem appropriate and to also
forward my name and contact information.
